string.text: Welcome! I have a few things to offer, interested?
Well lookie here, you have organized a snack Bar. To bad its so damn close to the freak'n radioactive heaps of dust.
For some people 'Garbage' is a hard place to reach and I congratulate you on that. It will most likely be forgotten quickly though.

Does it make any sense to you? Not far from here is a 'Bar' where stalkers buy and sell possessions. There we have bandits and all sorts of scumbags, and even checkpoints where the bandits will take your money.

Over at the Bar the guys are always serious and can easily get angry. So I warn you don't start any trouble there. Garbage is a place where the rookies find out if they can really handle the Zone. Fighting bandits, HA! This is not real combat. They need a few of us old guys to teach them a few things, and the ones that are not going to make it die within a week. They either step into an anomaly or become mutant snacks.
All right I heard enough about the rookies. Where are you from?

I was brought up in a forest and I traveled around Europe in the Army. When I got out of the Army I was working as a chef on the mainland. I didn't like the city life. Leftover food was given to cats and dogs while the homeless were walking around the streets hungry. I needed some adventure so I came to the Zone.
Who do I speak with around here concerning weapons, ammo and other supplies?
You want to talk to Vityok 'Raven'. He is a very mysterious guy.
Tell me more about this mysterious guy.

Want to know what is really mysterious here in the Zone? Ravens! If they have one talent among them its that they know where death is most likely to happen and they will fly above waiting for fresh corpses. That is how Vityok got the nickname 'Raven'. He is attracted to the dead rookies in Garbage and profits from their possessions. He has some good weapons available for trade though. You will find him outside the hanger.
Thank you for telling me what you know of Raven.
Is there something I can do for you?
Im looking for some better weapons and I also need some ammo.
I have a unique selection, but I only deal with skilled stalkers.
You only deal with skilled stalkers? What's that supposes to mean?
Only a few stalkers have the skill to acquire the goods that I will trade for.
I'm no rookie and if I have something you want, we will be doing business.
You certainly don't lack confidence. I hope our meeting is profitable for both of us.
Let's drop the small talk and get down to business, what do you have to offer?
